dictator_quotes.quote: You have to know everything in order to be completely safe
dictator_quotes.who: Erich Mielke, head of the East German Stasi
Maximilian Robespierre, National Assembly of France during the Reign of Terror

non_dictator_quotes.quote: You have zero privacy anyway. Get over it
You can't have 100% security and also then have 100% privacy and zero inconvenience
non_dictator_quotes.who: Barack Obama, President of the USA

non_dictator_quotes.quote: Leaking is tantamount to aiding the enemies of the [country
non_dictator_quotes.who: US Department of Defence internal strategy document

non_dictator_quotes.quote: I think the privacy issue has really been taken off the table.
